file_content.text: Please, I have nothing but respect for the Hutt Cartel, but this is--
They say a Jedi's behind this Guiding Hand. We've seen a Jedi coming out of these offices. Start talking, Cedrax.
Perhaps I could be of some assistance?
Try asking me instead.
I'd like to know who's asking these questions.
Who are you?
I have business with the professor. You can talk to him another time.
Come back later.
I don't think so.
I'm with the Hutt Cartel, investigating rumors that the Jedi run the Guiding Hand. Cedrax worked for them, and now here you are. I'll have to report this.
I'm just a friend of Doctor Cedrax. As for this "Guiding Hand," I assure you no Jedi are involved.
There's nothing to report.
Funny, because word is that a Jedi Master's behind it.
Guiding Hand? Who?
Really. You know nothing about a Jedi Master with a crusade against us.
Do you have any proof of this "Jedi Master" apart from rumor?
Is there evidence?
Well, no, but my contacts are normally solid. Though the Hutts might be... upset if this is only a rumor.
Maybe I'll run my info again. But I'm watching you. Both of you.
The Jedi have nothing whatsoever to do with the Guiding Hand. Report that to your masters.
[Force Persuade] No Jedi here.
I--I guess the Jedi have nothing to do with the Guiding Hand. Sorry to have bothered you.
I'm afraid I can't let you bring that information back to the Hutt Cartel.
Should've listened. [Attack]
Sorry. This must be kept secret no matter what the cost.
I must silence you. [Attack]
What? No! You can't do this!
